Reviews.Title: “Very well located”
Reviews.Author: Indra B
Reviews.Content: Stayed over a week in this hotel. I found the room to be very spacious comparing to other 4 star hotel in europe. Breakfast is so so , however the staff is quite attentive. What i love from this hotel is its location where strategic located in Kurfurstendamm.. within walking street to any local places. I found with 150 euro per night it provides value for money. I will definitely come back next year

Reviews.Title: “Excellent !”
Reviews.Author: RPVSpain
Reviews.Content: Finally a hotel that lives up to its category. Well located, well entertained, well maintained, friendly and above all, very rare these days: well-insulated room, no room noises nearby, pipes, etc. Chapeau. Breakfast copious and abundant in a large living room without the crowds of guests made the situation uncomfortable. Truly a hotel you get what you pay

Reviews.Title: “I don't feel welcome here.”
Reviews.Author: UlfKjell
Reviews.Content: Almost perfect location, for tourists in general, but you don't feel welcome here. Once you get the room you booked, it's nice and clean. But the road getting there...? It should be simple, but not at this hotel. Most of the staff seem tired of having guests around.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great staff!”
Reviews.Author: HappiestGirl80
Reviews.Content: we've stayed at the California hotel for 6 nights and enjoyed every minute! after checking in, we've got into our room which was located in the older section of the hotel and had no air condition in it (and it was HOT!). we were told by the receptionist that we've payed for the room that had no air condition in it, without knowing about it. however, she said, since the hotel is in full capacity, she cannot move us to a different room at the first night, but only tomorrow morning, with no extra charge! when we came back to our room, which took us 1-2 minutes, we saw a fan in the room. the next morning we were moved to the newer section of the hotel, in a great room, with no extra change. how fantastic is that?! besides that - a great great great location, good breakfast and as mentioned - AMAZING staff!

Reviews.Title: “OK - depends what you are looking for”
Reviews.Author: Thordis P
Reviews.Content: Great location, but old building and the hotel getting tired. Rooms fine, clean and comfortable. Missed not having tea and coffie making facilities in the room. Breakfast buffet nice. I like to keep active when I travel so the gym is quite important to me, here it is a disaster. No treadmill nor bike, the equipment in there is probably at least 20 years old. Never saw anyone in there, still hotel full. Paid eur 205 for a single pr night still the Rack rate on the wall said 190. Not worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant hotel at Ku'damm”
Reviews.Author: ieasabel
Reviews.Content: When I book it just before my arrival at BBB in July I paid really much. It was overpriced. The room was not magnificient but good:) Small bathroom. The breakfast offer was ok. It was in quite old building but hotel is modern even with new type elevator. Around the hotel is a lot of restaurants and fancy stores. Just right from the hotel. The KaDeWe is in different direction quite far for a walk. But maybe in summer it is ok. The hotel is close to Tegel Airport but from new BBI it will be a little far.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for weekend break”
Reviews.Author: Brian J
Reviews.Content: Good location on Ku'Damn, just over 200m from Uhlanderstraβe U-Bahn and under 10 minute walk from Zoologischer Garten station. Be aware that Google Earth has the hotel about 500m out of location half way between Uhlanderstraβe and Kurfurstendamn U-bahn - it’s not! 1st floor room was clean, comfortable, spacious and had a balcony overlooking Ku’Damn which was surprisingly quiet at night. Staff polite and helpful at reception. Breakfast room bright and airy with ok selection to set you up for the day. Wi-Fi in room is free and not €10 for 24 hours as advertised in Booking.com. Some good restaurants and cafes nearby but try Marjellchen, a great Prussian restaurant about 10 minutes’ walk away. Overall we were happy with the hotel, it’s more of a 3 star but ideal for a weekend break when time spent there is minimal and all you need is somewhere clean and comfortable to crash at the end of a long day.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location for our needs..................”
Reviews.Author: Lincolnshirechap
Reviews.Content: This hotel is towards the 'happening' end of the Ku'Damm and fairly close to Savigny Platz on Kant Strasse, a favourite square of mine (for eating and drinking). We don't normally stay in 3 or 4 star places as we travel a great deal (at our own expense): so this was a special treat, 5 nights B&B. Reception is lovely, olde worlde Berlin posh style: pleasant, helpful staff and room to sit and wait a while if you need too. The hotel is split into two distinct areas: one set of two lift covers two thirds of the hotel and another lift system takes you to the brealfast room and more rooms. We had to take the lift down from the 3rd floor and then walk across to some stairs to go back up to the 1st floor breakfast room: we could have used the other lift but we didn't! We booked well in advance and got a good deal. I did however have that sinking feeling when we started walking along the corridor to room 322: the smart red carpet ran out about 5 doors from our room and an old blue one took its place, and we seemed to have walked a fair distance from the lifts taking right angled corners at regular intervals, have we been given the cheap seats? There was no real reason to worry, inner courtyard view, but very quiet: shower room fine and the bedroom was neat, tidy and large enough for our requirements. The pictures of the Suits they advertise didn't look like our room though! Breakfast was simular to almost all European city hotels: on a grander scale than I'm used to though, large airy, bright room, plenty of staff and a good selection of the usual suspects both hot and cold to choose from. Self service but relaxed and un-rushed. I got what I paid for, no more no less: I'm sure the better, more expensive rooms are lovely, but the breakfast is the same for everyone: we don't stay in hotel rooms, we stay in places and enjoy the location, only sleeping, washing and breakfasting at our hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Another Hotel California”
Reviews.Author: Torrepinerolo
Reviews.Content: There are a few Hotel California's around, some preceded the song, others came afterwards. The receptionist told me this was in the second category and she said there was a connection but she wasn't quite sure what it was. This is perfectly good hotel which provides reasonable comfort, with adequate service at an acceptable price in a central and convenient location. Who could ask for anything more? This isn't damming with faint praise. Middle of the road is all that most of us want or expect most of the time.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing special, just one of many hotels at Ku'damm”
Reviews.Author: ksiazemati
Reviews.Content: In my opinion it is just 3 stars hotel at Ku'damm. But the eastern part of it so quite far from KaDeWe. Located near the entrance to metro ( u-bahn) station. The breakfast offer was medium. The rooms are small. The service was good. The prices are overestimate in trade terms. If You do not have any other choice than You can take this hotel especially because of location.

Reviews.Title: “nice place to meeting”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_EPWR
Reviews.Content: The hotel is greated placed on the Kurfurstendamm, right in the middle of Berlin's major shopping street. It is very close to the nearest S-Bahn station, about 10 mins walk, and there are U-Bahn stations even closer. The room was quite spacious and clean for the price. The staff were very pleasant and helpful. Huge breakfast buffet, and a pleasant bar to go to for a drink in the evening. I had problems with the heating and hot water. There is not much faciliaties in the room same as other 4* hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice hotel.”
Reviews.Author: ChicagoCityDweller
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel during a solo trip in Europe. I arrived mid-evening and was thrilled to see the outdoor seating with holiday music playing and a small bar with bar service; great welcome experience! Check-in wasn't memorable but it was efficient. My room was nice and the bed was large (two full/twin beds made up a larger bed) but the bathroom was horrendously small. The shower was a walk-in and the doors closed around you. It felt like I was in a spaceship. Thank goodness I'm not very fat because I'd never have fit in the shower (the shower was my least favorite thing about this room). I did like the fact that the hotel was eco conscious, meaning you needed your key card to activate the lights in the room and the lights deactivated once you left for the day and took the keycard out. The breakfast was so-so. It was very crowded in the breakfast room in the morning and the breakfast room was a little confusing to find. I ended up not finishing my breakfast because I wasn't particularly enjoying children running all over. I'd have preferred the parents to seat their children and then sort out their breakfast rather than hold up the buffet line while waddling with them down the line. The other thing I disliked about this hotel is how LOUD the courtyard is at night and in the early morning. Forget leaving your windows open - the staff and guests are in the courtyard at all hours of the night smoking and the smell seeps into your room (gross). In the morning the staff is sorting inventory for the bar (or so it looked like) and it was VERY noisy and disturbing. The bar staff inside were not the most friendly. I never really got a warm feeling from their service and one night after I ordered inside and tipped the bartender well, I sat outside only to watch the bartender cater to two men who'd just sat down. Why had he not brought me peanuts and a napkin like he did for them? The Welcome Drink was a nice touch, but a little off putting that it was limited only to the hot wine. I don't particularly like hot wine, so this added offer was lost on me. The hotel is located just about a block from the pick-up for a hop-on-hop off tour. It was a nice tour and it was great that the drop off was so close to the hotel front door. All-in-all, I'd probably stay at this hotel again if nothing else, for the location. However, this particular part of Berlin has a Manhattan-type vibe to it where the shops are all upscale and too expensive to afford. There is a Starbucks around the corner and a delicious restaurant called 'Capone' within a block, not to miss.

Reviews.Title: “HOTEL LOCATION VERY GOOD”
Reviews.Author: ies2995
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel in November 2011. It was very pleasant and buffet was good. Room was as advertised and location for buses and underground were very good. Just a short walk to hop on hop off bus which we recommend.

Reviews.Title: “christmassy hotel”
Reviews.Author: morrison5
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very central and within easy acsess of the trains and buses. I stayed in their junior suite which I found very spacious with good high ceiling and it looked onto the main street. The pillows where hard and flat which is the only downside of the room, bathroom was a good size too.I visited here at Christmas and found it so christmassy, they have christmas music playing outside where they set up a gluwine bar and very comfortable seat with blankets and heaters so so nice to relax there after the days sightseeing and shopping. So much to see and do in Berlin fantastic city and this hotel is perfect for that and is well priced too. Breakfast is just basic and that and the pillows are the only things I would change. Lovely staff very helpfull! Would stay here again when I go back.

Reviews.Title: “Efficient and Very Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: nickcambridge
Reviews.Content: On the Kurfurstendamm - the Bond Street of Berlin surrounded by designer shops - with good access to busses, u-bahn and s-bahn. The wrong side of town for tourist sites such as Brandenburg Gate, Reichstag etc but transport is easy so really doesn't matter. Unpretentious front but large and very comfortable (and quiet) rooms. Great buffet breakfast and free internet. Excellent value.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for a city break”
Reviews.Author: carha
Reviews.Content: We have just returned fron a 3 night stay at this hotel. It is in a very good location with the zoo station about 5 minutes walk - from here you can easily travel on the U bahn and S bahn network. The hotel is welcoming - very helpful staff on the reception. Our room was on the small side but the fixtures were of a high quality and it was very clean. The bathroom was especially small but the shower was excellent. The items in the mini bar were very reasonably priced. Breakfast was served in a spacious modern restaurant area with a good choice generally although the hot selection of food was a bit limited. All in all this hotel was excellent value for money and we would definitely use this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Unimpressive staff”
Reviews.Author: Linda W
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself is very well located and the rooms are nice, that is if you get one with airconditioning that works. Without that the room is stifling hot and uncomtortable for sleeping. The staff were extremely unhelpful to the point of being rude.

Reviews.Title: “Very Central”
Reviews.Author: donegaltrip
Reviews.Content: Nice Hotel very central quiet room good breakfast lots of nice resturants and shoping on the door step would stay there again by far the best hotel in the center of Berlin

Reviews.Title: “Nothing Special”
Reviews.Author: Anna K
Reviews.Content: Price was ok and located close to a metro station but cannot say it is close to any attractions or touristic areas. Don't know if it has been re-furbished since Oct 10' but back then it needed some changes it looked old. Especially room's doors and bathroom.

Reviews.Title: “Simply The Best! Impressive Staff!”
Reviews.Author: matulessy_alice
Reviews.Content: When I checked in, i was welcomed courteously by the bell staff and receptionist. The check-in process was fast and efficient. The room room was clean and bright. They event provided nice flowers and fruits. Breakfast buffet was standard but still good quality service. As the hotel location is right at the famous Kudamm area, it was nice sitting outside with a glass of wine and watching people passing by. During coffee tea time, the cafe gives free selected homemade cake. I like the cheese cake. The hotel is also located just few blocks away from the shopping area in Kudamm street. Nice hotel at good location and good price. What i like most was their excellent staff. They always greet and asked if everything was fine with my stay. They made everything possible for me. I stayed there twice and I have booked my room for my business trip next year already.

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: R30PSP
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the California on B & B basis for 4 days in June. Booked a superior room ( very quiet) located at the back of the hotel overlooking a try lined courtyard. The breakfast is served in a large, light dining room with great buffet choices. The hotel is located 5 minutes walk from the Zoo Station on the tree lined K,stam Avenue where there are great resteraunts and chic shops.Would recomment this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Needs a lot of work”
Reviews.Author: Richc75
Reviews.Content: I'm thankfully checking out of the hotel in a few hours but felt compelled to write my first review here to help others avoid what has been a miserable stay. The room itself is very small, I was surprised at the pokiness, only just enough room to walk around the beds. Plus there is NO aircon, be warned in the Summer. Things get very sweaty and hot. The beds are appalling at the hotel cali, small - your feet hang off the end (I'm only 5 11) and the duvet and pillows are the type of cheap, light items that heat up intensely after a few minutes, the pillows prevent sleep rather than aid it. I've never slept in a hotel bed that is less designed for sleep. Awful. Building work is clearly required throughout. The floors are so creaky, which is almost comical when you're walking in your own room, but try laughing when you're in bed and can hear everything above you. The noise coming through the ceiling and the walls is intolerable. 2 uk channels only, which isn't really up to speed with modern satellite services. And the wifi costs 10 euros a day! Not free unless you book direct. That was 40 euros for me. Room cleanliness was fine, although they tend not to change the little shampoo bottles very day, more like every other - so be sure to use half a day! Breakfast was ok, fruit and cereal available, along with the eggs and cold meats you would expect in Berlin. No pastries. The best thing about this hotel is it's location. It would be a 2 star rated hotel if it was based in the UK, NOT 4 star. All in all, I'm very happy to checking out. Don't stay here if you care about your city break in Berlin!

Reviews.Title: “Good Value and nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Deborooroo
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights in June - it was a girls city break. It was a good location, on the Ku'dam - great street for shopping. The underground train stop is just outside the hotel about 3 minute walk, you will see the "U" in the middle of the street. If you travel on the trains to get to the hotel from the airport at Schonefeld, stay on till the end of the green line which terminates at Uhlandstr, which takes you right to the hotel california. It only cost us 3 euros each to do this journey so great value if you are on a tight budget - the taxis are expensive and we did not use them. so used the U & S bahns to get around. We shared a triple room as there were 3 of us - it was a nice big room, the 3rd bed was comfortable too. A Coffee and tea making facility would have been great, but I suppose its not essential. Our Breakfast was included and was very good, there was a big range of hot and cold items to choose between. We treated ourselves to an amazing Kaffe und Kuchen, at at Fassbender and Rausch Choclaterie which is situated beside the Gendermarket - very expensive but the best coffee and cake - yummy! My only negative comment about the hotel is that they should invest in a decent air conditioning system - the one they have is rubbish, so we had our window open the whole time which did get quite noisy at times!

Reviews.Title: “Awful service, but great location”
Reviews.Author: scaccomatto999
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located on one of the main streets of Berlin, where all shops, restaurants are around. However, I must say that the service was awful. Absolutely no smiles, as on review said, and the check-in process was horrible. There was a guy that looked indian or arab, and he was just terrible. Very arrogant, not polite and absolutely not professional. I felt like I was entering a jail. not a 4 star hotel. Anyway, the rooms are way too small, and the breakfast is very poor. No croassants, not fresh orange juice and not a huge selection of bread. The cleaning of rooms was not made properly, and they were cleaned very late in the day. They do provide wi-fi internet with a ridiculous cost of 3 euros for 2 hours. Are you kidding me??? I would not come back!

Reviews.Title: “Not as good as we expected”
Reviews.Author: landin802
Reviews.Content: The hotel is well situated at Kurfürstendamm with a nice cafe outside. The room was a superieur-room but not as elegant as expected. The cleaning of the room was slovenly.The staff at the reception was impolite, they never said hello or even looked at you when you came or went.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel California am Kurfurstendamm”
Reviews.Author: vincenthannon
Reviews.Content: Nice Hotel and the location is excellent. I upgraded from a standard to a superior and the room was good for the money. In terms of TV there was only one english station but this was not an issue for me. The staff were very friendly and helpful. I ate at the hotel one night and the food was good, breckfast was limited and a little average but no diffrent to most hotles in Germnay. All in all considering what you can pay for this hotel the location is outstanding and it proves good value for money, would recomend.

Reviews.Title: “ok hotel”
Reviews.Author: KFilip
Reviews.Content: hotel is located in famous Ku`dam, really steps away from KDW, very well connected with rest of the city from S and U station Zoologischegarten which is maybe 300 m away from hotel. rooms are small, oldish stile, yet very well kept and clean. mostly rooms overlook hotel garden so there is no noise from the street. Breakfast is just fantastic with variety of food rarely seen in hotels 4* in Germany. Some of hotel staff at reception is a bit arrogant but others are really great and helpful. i am positive that in same price range you could find even better hotels in same location for same price.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel, perfect location...”
Reviews.Author: Yogilly
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in hotel during the congress in Berlin. First impression was a bit poor, since we have arrived a bit late in the evening and reception staff was a bit slow, but not rude or anything like that. Later they were very friendly and helpful. Room looks a little bit small at first sight, but very comfortable. The only flaw is small bathroom and shower tub - if you are a bit larger, you might consider of being careful in turning around the bathroom... :) Excellent breakfast service, if you're lucky, you might even catch a seat next to the panoramic window and enjoy sunlight on Ku'damm. Location is perfect - basically in the center of West Berlin, within the walking distance of famous shopping malls, Kaiser-Wilhelm's memorial church and Zoo station. You can easily reach any part of the city within 20 minutes only by using public transport. Since we were going to the ICC also, you need 15 minutes to reach it. On the other hand, you need not more than 20 minutes to the Alexanderplatz, so it is very practical for sightseeings.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service; Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Kayiio
Reviews.Content: Was there during ITB. The location was perfect (7mn from Messe by taxi). The staff is very helpful. My room was large with a nice view on Ku'dam.

Reviews.Title: “Triple Room 'Superior'?”
Reviews.Author: unthankelan
Reviews.Content: If you book aTriple Room (Superior ) at this hotel please be warned that one of the beds is a small camp bed. I booked this room for a trip with my 2 adult daughters and did not expect one of us having to sleep in a very hard small camp bed. We checked out on the morning of departure and our luggage was locked away in a secure store room. But when we returned later in the afternoon there was NO courtesy room for a freshen up. We were told to use the toilets in the basement! It was quite a squeeze even with a small piece of luggage. I have never been anywhere in the world where a courtesy room is not offered. the rating of the hotel is 4 star but I think just manages a 3 star and that is only because of the impressive entrance.

Reviews.Title: “california am kurfurstendamm berlin”
Reviews.Author: sofly84
Reviews.Content: I booked for a double room for one person and was straight away given a single room. I had to come back and claim with the reservation for a double room. People at reception did not even apologized for any mistake and just explained it was because there was no non smoking double room left. I finally ended up with a smoking double room. This is no 4 star hotel, 3 star at best is more appropriate. There was some lino in the bathroom, no bathtube but a simple shower and some dirty towel left on the floor in the bathroom. What's more, you have to pay an extra 12.5€ for the sauna. Wifi in the room is also an option.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: BerkoBoy88
Reviews.Content: Just spent 4 nights there with my wife and it was a great value for money offer. Booked in August 2010 for November and paid £248 for B&B. Room 204 very small with shower room (no bath) but clean and comfortable beds. We requested a quiet room and that's what we got. I have seen noisier grave yards. Perfect. Great location in arguably the best street in Berlin. Breakfast very good, cold meats, selection of breads, eggs, cereals, coffee, tea & juices all more than adequate. Staff knowledgeable and helpful. Internet access via their PC only 1€ for 30 minutes. Welcome drink (bucks Fizz) on arrival, nice touch. No meals (only breakfast) available & therefore no room service. No tea/coffee facilities in room. Good restaurants all very close as is underground and railway.

Reviews.Title: “Almost PERFECT!”
Reviews.Author: Nicky483
Reviews.Content: We had very clean rooms. Maybe a little bit small but very comfortable! We found a very nice bathroom! What we didn't like was the door from bath- to bedroom. You just can't get the privacy you want because of that door made out of glass. The beds were good and big enough! Also a big closet and a nice desk. We liked the Gummi-bears we found on our pillows every time the rooms got cleaned. Those or just one of those things that make it a bit more special. Air-conditioning could have been MUCH better, but the isolation was awesome! We weren't even aware anymore of the fact that we were staying in a huge city like Berlin. Location was also very good, nice street with nice shops. Mini-bar was excellent but maybe too expensive. Breakfast was perfect! Everything you want was there. We've recommended this hotel to everyone we know who wants to visit Berlin and we even think the hotel deserves another star! :) We definitely want to return!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not Impresses”
Reviews.Author: CillaBang
Reviews.Content: Great location but..... Rooms are mixed. Bed Comfortable. No airconditioning so if you need to open windows for air you are kept awake by street noise if you are on a street facing room. Had to ask for towels to be changed two days in a row as the towel supplied were worn out. Bathroom was clean but impossible to shower without wetting the whole floor, which was then slippy.

Reviews.Title: “Fatal room service”
Reviews.Author: carlesxavier316080
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel the second week of August 2010 and I want to highlight two negative aspects: you have to pay at check-in moment(never happened before) and two days the room was not cleaned and ready until five p.m.. If you want to relax before evening, look for another hotel

Reviews.Title: “LOcation great but service needs improving”
Reviews.Author: DanielThomas
Reviews.Content: Great location on the Ku'damm within walking distance of the Europa Centre, Ka De We, U-Bahn and local restaurants. It was 90 degrees plus last week - we were in an older part of the hotel and there was no air con. The staff did bring us a couple of porable fans pretty quickly. However, as in other reviews, the customer service and courtesy levels were very poor, especially at the front desk. Residents were there as paying guests, not unwanted lodgers, and the hotel management would do well to address this.

Reviews.Title: “You can check out any time you like, but you can never leave”
Reviews.Author: JButterfield
Reviews.Content: This hotel was on the Kurfurstendamm. Our triple room had a balcony that overlooked the street. We were close to shopping (Kadewe), Wilhelm Church, city tour stop, and transportation. There were shops and cafes all around--we had a terrific location. The room was nicely appointed and clean and the hotel was quite nice. All they need is a service oriented staff and they will have a great hotel. We spent 3 weeks traveling in Germany and stayed in 8 hotels--this was by far the most disappointing. The worst was the mix up in or reservation. Before we arrived, we made a change through our booking agent to cancel one night. When we arrived the entire reservation was cancelled. I don't know who was at fault, but rather than working with us and the booking agent, they made this a huge deal. They had the room--that wasn't the problem--they just wouldn't work with us to straighten out the billing. Even after the booking agent called them twice, and everthing was fixed, they didn't have a record of that information when we checked out. We had a triple room, but only 2 sets of towels--when we asked for extra towels, they left hand towels only. The front desk staff was not helpful or friendly when we asked for local information. We tried to eat at the hotel restaraunt on two occasions--but left to eat at the cafe next door both times, because we never got a waiter. The food at the breakfast buffet was good, but they were consistently out of plates and glasses. This was the only place we stayed where they didn't serve our coffee--this was not 4-star service. I am sorry Hotel California--we were so looking forward to our stay--even though we loved the hotel and our location, we could not wait to check out. :(

Reviews.Title: “my second time in this hotel, and still very good”
Reviews.Author: romain524
Reviews.Content: Rooms are spacious, location one of the best (just in the middle of Kundamm) and so good for the shopping. Staff are very helpfull I higly recommand this hotel for Leisure or business.

Reviews.Title: “A great stay! Would definitely recommend”
Reviews.Author: gingera
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my sister at the Hotel California for 2 nights in April. It had been 10 years since I had last stayed there and I was surprised at the current size of the hotel. We chose to stay here again because of the location. The hotel is right in the centre of the action and so easy to access restaurants, metro, shops and tourist attractions. We walked everywhere and appreciated the convenience of coming back to this location. We had a room facing the Kudamm and found it very quiet. We did not hear any noise from the street or the rest of the hotel. I would recommend having breakfast at one of the local bakeries rather than paying the price at the hotel. The staff was very friendly and welcoming and greeted us each time we entered the hotel. I would highly recommend this hotel and I speak from the experience of staying in many hotels across North America and Europe.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, nothing else!”
Reviews.Author: TheChadi
Reviews.Content: The hall taking you to the rooms reminded me of my very old dorm halls. This definitely is a 2* hotel in a 4* location. The location is excellent with a u-bahn stop right outside the hotel and plenty of restaurants and shops around. It's basically the place you want to be. S-bahn stations are a bit further out to get to though. The bathroom was tiny and was not able to move around inside it. One of the rooms we were given was so small my friend wasn't able to open his bag anywhere other than the bed! My room was a bigger size. The hotel rooms are very old and need refurbishing. The bed wasn't the best I have slept on. You normally don't spend a lot of time in the hotel room anyway but for the same price I would stay in a far better hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A perfect hotel for my visit to Berlin”
Reviews.Author: Pentictontraveler
Reviews.Content: Perfectly located for public transport, restaurants, shopping, sightseeing. I like old hotels and this one has been recently renovated, very well equipped, cheerful rooms, nice plumbing, comfy beds. For the price, it would be hard to imagine what more you could ask.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, spotlessly clean, would definatly go back again”
Reviews.Author: TOKY
Reviews.Content: We had booked a hotel which decided to close for refurbishment , so Alpha rooms offered this one instead. I was delighted with the hotel. It's very central for Zoologicher gardens station, Savignyplatz station and all the buses. The hotel has a lovely foyer, quite grand, but the hotel is split in 2. One side appears to be very modern and our side was more traditional???????dated??????? However our room was great, beds very comfy, spacious and most of all quiet. Multi channel TV, hairdryer and plenty storage space. It over looked a courtyard at back of hotel, where it seems you could sit outside , weather permitting. Staff at reception, restaurant and cleaning, were most pleasant. Outside the front of the hotel, they had set up a bar, covered seating and heated area, selling hot winter punches or drinks from the hotel bar. Nice touch. Breakfast was varied and there were lots of choices, much more than the usual Continental breakfast. I would definitely go back again.

Reviews.Title: “holidays”
Reviews.Author: AzyG
Reviews.Content: clean hotel, nice and polite service with rich breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and location”
Reviews.Author: optcats
Reviews.Content: Good location, easy access with U-Bahn and bus. Good breakfast. Room was nicely outfitted with widescreen satellite TV. Only negative was having to pay for internet, which cost more to use in the rooms than when using the one working terminal in the lobby. Very nice and helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel - definitely recommended”
Reviews.Author: mandy kidd
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Hotel California for 10 nights during the Athletics World Championships and couldn't fault it. Room comfortable, desk staff friendly, first class breakfasts, and a lovely street cafe at the front of the hotel, also very convenient for all forms of public transport. Would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: Kris08
Reviews.Content: Easy access to shops, restaurants and sights. Excellent breakfast. The soundproofing a bit poor, if you have a neigbour that likes his tv.

Reviews.Title: “Very rude staff”
Reviews.Author: traveler4
Reviews.Content: Except for it´s location there is nothing good to say about this hotel and it´s not a 4 star hotel. My partner and I are regular visitors to Berlin and have stayed at number of different hotels in the town as we like to try out new hotels as well as visit the good ones we have experienced before. This hotel is lack of everything a good hotel needs and really needs a work to be done especially when it comes to the staff. We have never experienced such a rudeness and lack of common courtesies in any hotel we have stayed at and I´m sorry to say but the reception manager was the worst. The room was no more than ok but nothing what you expect from a 4 star hotel, very basic and worn out and the same counts for the breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: HayleyM_87
Reviews.Content: My partner and I stayed here in a basic double room for 3 nights and were very happy. The hotel is in a really nice area with great shopping and the Zoo close by. There are metro stations and buses everywhere so getting around was no problem at all. The room itself was not the biggest but it was modern, clean and quiet, although im sure the rooms facing the street would have had a bit more noise. The buffet breakfast was great, huge choice for all tastes, and for us was included in the price. The staff were nice enough and the hotel had internet and wifi avail to those with laptops. We stayed in October so the temperature was comfortable but be warned if staying in summer as there is no air con or fans. We were definately impressed with value for money and would recommend it no worries.

Reviews.Title: “Hot and Sweaty”
Reviews.Author: The_Puppeteer
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel is probably the best thing going for it. Located centrally and close to many tourist sites, and across the road from the main stop of the hop-on hop-off bus. The staff were helpful and quite nice but the hotel was old and in our opinion far from the 4 stars on the sign. Rooms were tired and old. It was a hot summers day when we arrived and the hotel room was like a sauna and very small, with a tiny bathroom. None of the rooms have air-conditioning so be warned if you are coming in summer. The television in our room did not work properly always stopping and starting like it had a loose wire, and the pay TV system did not work for most of our stay. The room was not cleaned properly with pubic hair in the bed, certainly not what we were looking for, for our honeymoon. Our room looked out to a concrete wall and downstairs all night it sounded like there were bins for the bar with constant banging and crashing. Extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: NLM13
Reviews.Content: The staff was absolutely fabulous and spoke fluent English. The room was immaculate and the breakfast buffet was above expectations. My family and I really enjoyed the cafe on site. My 5 yr old insists we go back to the hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: roundy77
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel cos we got a great deal on booking.com. The website says it is a 4 star, but it isn't really. More like a 3. It is a pleasant enough hotel, but very dated, especially the bedrooms. On the plus side it is in a great location, near good shopping and restaurants, with lots of transport links just outside the door. Staff were lovely and very helpful. Breakfast was nice too. It is a basic hotel, but well priced.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: thegrant
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with the Hotel California. I stayed with my wife and two sons, aged 3 and 1 years. Although we only booked the room on the morning of our arrival they were able to provide 2 cots for our sons and gave us a superior room at no additional cost. The room was big ans spotless. It had a huge flat screen tv attached to the wall and a small balcony with a table and chairs. The breakfast buffet was very good. It had a large choice of food, both hot and cold. The hotel is also in an excellent location being on Kurfurstendam. Plenty of shops, restaurants, cafes nearby. The U-bahn and S-bahn stops are a short walk away

Reviews.Title: “Fortunately, I loved staying at California Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cid-from_Brazil
Reviews.Content: I was affraid of what was expecting me, because other persons reviews. But I had a great experience at this place and I would recomend it. Our room (number 422) was very small, but enough for a couple and we could manage space for luggage and this made our 5- nights stay, a very good one. We´ve got a room on the Executive Floor, where seems renovation have just been done. Our bathroom was all done in marble and everything seems new. Safe in room was a complimentary finding and the breakfast, wonderfull: cereals, yohurts, cheese, fruits, honey, coffee, hot chocolat, orange juice, fruit salads and many other things. Staff always very kind with great suggestions on how to move in the aerea. It´s location on the beginning of Kudam is another great privilege. I would only suggest that old guests should take care with the slippery tub. We have made our reservation directly to the hotel and we got a good value (94 Euros/ night without any other tax and breakfast included). Internet is available at the reception (2 stations) for 2 Euro/ hour and I could see other quests with their laptops in the reception, as this is a WiFi place.

Reviews.Title: “loved california”
Reviews.Author: dtoe5
Reviews.Content: stayed at california for 5 nights in march 15 to 20th. Hotel was great. Staff could not have been more friendly. Breakfast was great no line no waiting , plenty to eat each morning. service was great..had drinks and played cards in the bar with no problems..Rooms were what we paid for, clean and neat. New baths. would stay again anytime.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible weekend in **** California Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jjlWroclaw
Reviews.Content: I am frequent Berlin visitor. I booked superior room for two days on the California Hotel webside. On check-in the receptionist announced that the regular and superior rooms are occupied, so he give us "apartament", located in the nearby building. As it turned out "apartment" was regular flat with a lot of gabrage containers in the front of the windows, equiped as ** hotel, filthy, stinked and dusty. The next day they moved me to the superior room, but not as requested in booking form- "non smoking", but the stench of tobacco was not very strong. The breakfast included in the room rate was disaster! Cold, tasteless scrambled eggs, hard bread and smell of old kitchen backroom. Finally, I conclude the only hotel adventage of the California Hotel are great location and nice lobby, they not quarantee you got the room you chose. Never again the **** California Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Just insist on getting what you've paid for!”
Reviews.Author: Chandolin
Reviews.Content: I had booked a Superior room because we were going to be there for eight nights and I wanted us to be very comfortable. We arrived late in the afternoon. The room we were given was on the top floor, but must have actually been in the building next door (we had to go out into another stairway and in through a locked door). It was tiny, with no place to put bags or anything else, only one bed lamp, the TV was a flat screen about 9 or 10 feet high that could only be watched from the bed with a craned neck, and the flushed toilet splashed on the seat. I had seen photos on the hotel's web site of what must have been a Superior room, and this certainly wasn't. I immediately went down to complain, and was told that this WAS a Superior room (I’m sure that wasn’t true), but if we weren’t satisfied with it, we could change the next day, as they were fully booked. We seemed to have no choice, so unpacked as little as possible that night. The next day, we repacked before going out for the day so our bags could be moved. When we returned to our new room, we were very pleased. The room was lovely, on the same floor, but before the double doors, large, pleasant, and definitely a Superior room. If we had only had it from the beginning . . . So our warning is as follows -- don't be taken in by the smooth-talking reception desk staff and insist on getting what you have paid for!

Reviews.Title: “Don't look like a tourist at Hotel California!”
Reviews.Author: skippytravel
Reviews.Content: Hotel mostly good, but watch out if you are dressed in jeans like a tourist. I've repeatedly been treated less favourably (service quality) than people in suits. Otherwise a nice hotel in a good location. We are in a first floor room - it is extremely noisy in the morning. Ask for a room on a higher floor where it might be quieter.

Reviews.Title: “Very good location, nice big room”
Reviews.Author: tempest26
Reviews.Content: To be honest, I was a bit worried about the quality of the hotel from the name of it (sounds a bit whimsical). But was pleasantly surprised when I got there, to discover a nice and classic looking hotel, that the room was spacious, and the staff very friendly and fluent in English. There was even a complimentary bottle of California Red for me in my room. Bathroom was a decent size too. I could only watch 2 TV channels (CNN and BBC world), and trying to use the internet in the room (not free) was quite difficult (gave up and and used the free internet on the hotel's desktop downstairs instead, but it's not usually avaiable as people are always using it). The hotel has very good breakfast, and for people who were attending the big exhibition that I was in Berlin for, there was even a complimentary afternoon tea, coffee & Snacks session for us in the late afternoon to welcome us back to the hotel. Location is great too. Very close to Uhlandstrasse station and in a safe, clean and central neighbourhood. Making it a very good place for us to stay in.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Central Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel, great location for sightseeing and shops. Friendly staff, good English. Hotel very clean, modern & good quality - parts were being refurbished when we stayed but no intrusive noise for guests. Excellent buffet breakfast. Ask for a room with a balcony - a bit more expensive but well worth it for the huge room, good views of Kurfurstendamm & fresh air (not noisy at all due to double glazing)! Can not recommend this hotel highly enough, we really enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Welcome to the Hotel California!”
Reviews.Author: forensicsgirl
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly and fluent in English. The buffet breakfast had a good variety of food and beverages. The room was small but comfortable. This hotel is conveniently located near a U-bahn stop. The only drawback was the shortage of hot water in the mornings.

HotelInfo.Name: California am Kurfurstendamm
HotelInfo.Address: Kurfuerstendamm 35, 10719 Berlin, Germany (Formerly Hotel California)
